server - package server
Provides the classes necessary to represent any hippodrome region on the server side of the execution.
server - Static variable in class server.ServerLauncher
The instance of a general server.
server - Variable in class server.ServiceProviderAgent
The instance of a server received from the outside
Server - Interface in server
Interface to be implemented in every hippodrome region.

Definition of the configurations for the hippodrome regions (also known as server).
